word: A Man Bewitched. The persistency in Elder H to accept and claim Mrs. S as his--what shall I call it--his affinity? What is this? Who can name it? Is Elder H one who has hated the light God has given him, showing that his preferences for Mrs. S's society, and his intimacy with her, was sinful as in the light of the Word of God? Or did he accept the message and act upon it?
